Name: Absorb
Description: User recovers half the HP inflicted on opponent.

Name: Bide
Description: User takes damage for two turns then strikes back double.

Name: Bind
Description: Traps opponent, damaging them for 4-5 turns.

Name: Clamp
Description: Traps opponent, damaging them for 4-5 turns.

Name: Constrict
Description: May lower opponent's Speed by one stage.

Name: Conversion
Description: Changes user's type to that of its first move.

Name: Counter
Description: When hit by a Physical Attack, user strikes back with 2x power.

Name: Cut
Description: The target is cut with a scythe or claw.

Name: Dig
Description: Digs underground on first turn, attacks on second. Can also escape from caves.

Name: Disable
Description: Opponent can't use its last attack for a few turns.

Name: Dream Eater
Description: User recovers half the HP inflicted on a sleeping opponent.

Name: Earthquake
Description: Power is doubled if opponent is underground from using Dig.

Name: Egg Bomb
Description: An egg is forcibly hurled at the foe.

Name: Fire Spin
Description: Traps opponent, damaging them for 4-5 turns.

Name: Fly
Description: Flies up on first turn, attacks on second turn.

Name: Growth
Description: Raises user's Attack and Special Attack.

Name: Gust
Description: Hits Pokémon using Fly/Bounce/Sky Drop with double power.

Name: High Jump Kick
Description: If it misses, the user loses half their HP.

Name: Horn Attack
Description: An attack using a horn to jab.

Name: Hydro Pump
Description: Blasts water at high power to strike the foe.

Name: Jump Kick
Description: If it misses, the user loses half their HP.

Name: Leech Life
Description: User recovers half the HP inflicted on opponent.

Name: Leech Seed
Description: Drains HP from opponent each turn.

Name: Light Screen
Description: Halves damage from Special attacks for 5 turns.

Name: Low Kick
Description: The heavier the opponent, the stronger the attack.

Name: Mega Drain
Description: User recovers half the HP inflicted on opponent.

Name: Metronome
Description: User performs almost any move in the game at random.

Name: Mirror Move
Description: User performs the opponent's last move.

Name: Mist
Description: User's stats cannot be changed for a period of time.

Name: Night Shade
Description: Inflicts damage equal to user's level.

Name: Pay Day
Description: Money is earned after the battle.

Name: Petal Dance
Description: User attacks for 2-3 turns but then becomes confused.

Name: Razor Wind
Description: Charges on first turn, attacks on second. High critical hit ratio.

Name: Recover
Description: User recovers half its max HP.

Name: Reflect
Description: Halves damage from Physical attacks for 5 turns.

Name: Rest
Description: User sleeps for 2 turns, but user is fully healed.

Name: Roar
Description: In battles, the opponent switches. In the wild, the Pokémon runs.

Name: Seismic Toss
Description: Inflicts damage equal to user's level.

Name: Skull Bash
Description: Raises Defense on first turn, attacks on second.

Name: Sky Attack
Description: Charges on first turn, attacks on second. May cause flinching. High critical hit ratio.

Name: Soft-Boiled
Description: User recovers half its max HP.

Name: Solar Beam
Description: Charges on first turn, attacks on second.

Name: Struggle
Description: Only usable when all PP are gone. Hurts the user.

Name: Substitute
Description: Uses HP to creates a decoy that takes hits.

Name: Super Fang
Description: Always takes off half of the opponent's HP.

Name: Teleport
Description: Allows user to flee wild battles; also warps player to last PokéCenter.

Name: Thrash
Description: User attacks for 2-3 turns but then becomes confused.

Name: Transform
Description: User takes on the form and attacks of the opponent.

Name: Tri Attack
Description: May paralyze, burn or freeze opponent.

Name: Twineedle
Description: Hits twice in one turn. May poison opponent.

Name: Whirlwind
Description: In battles, the opponent switches. In the wild, the Pokémon runs.

Name: Wrap
Description: Traps opponent, damaging them for 4-5 turns.

Name: Aromatic Mist
Description: Raises Special Defense of an ally.

Name: Baby-Doll Eyes
Description: Always goes first. Lowers the target's attack.

Name: Belch
Description: User must have consumed a Berry.

Name: Celebrate
Description: The Pokémon congratulates you on your special day. No battle effect.

Name: Crafty Shield
Description: Protects the Pokémon from status moves.

Name: Dragon Ascent
Description: Lowers user's Defense and Special Defense.

Name: Draining Kiss
Description: User recovers most the HP inflicted on opponent.

Name: Electric Terrain
Description: Prevents all Pokémon from falling asleep for 5 turns.

Name: Electrify
Description: Changes the target's move to Electric type.

Name: Fairy Lock
Description: Prevents fleeing in the next turn.

Name: Fell Stinger
Description: Drastically raises user's Attack if target is KO'd.

Name: Flower Shield
Description: Sharply raises Defense of all Grass-type Pokémon on the field.

Name: Flying Press
Description: Deals Fighting and Flying type damage.

Name: Freeze-Dry
Description: May freeze opponent. Super-effective against Water types.

Name: Geomancy
Description: Charges on first turn, sharply raises user's Sp. Attack, Sp. Defense and Speed on the second.

Name: Grassy Terrain
Description: Restores a little HP of all Pokémon for 5 turns.

Name: Happy Hour
Description: Doubles prize money from trainer battles.

Name: Hold Back
Description: Always leaves opponent with at least 1 HP.

Name: Hold Hands
Description: Makes the user and an ally very happy.

Name: Hyperspace Fury
Description: Lowers user's Defense. Can strike through Protect/Detect.

Name: Infestation
Description: Traps opponent, damaging them for 4-5 turns.

Name: King's Shield
Description: Protects the user and lowers opponent's Attack on contact.

Name: Magnetic Flux
Description: Raises Defense and Sp. Defense of Plus/Minus Pokémon.

Name: Misty Terrain
Description: Protects the field from status conditions for 5 turns.

Name: Noble Roar
Description: Lowers opponent's Attack and Special Attack.

Name: Oblivion Wing
Description: User recovers most of the HP inflicted on opponent.

Name: Parabolic Charge
Description: User recovers half the HP inflicted on opponent.

Name: Parting Shot
Description: Lowers opponent's Attack and Special Attack then switches out.

Name: Phantom Force
Description: Disappears on first turn, attacks on second. Can strike through Protect/Detect.

Name: Powder
Description: Damages Pokémon using Fire type moves.

Name: Rototiller
Description: Raises Attack and Special Attack of Grass-types.

Name: Spiky Shield
Description: Protects the user and inflicts damage on contact.

Name: Sticky Web
Description: Lowers opponent's Speed when switching into battle.

Name: Thousand Arrows
Description: Makes Flying-type Pokémon vulnerable to Ground moves.

Name: Venom Drench
Description: Lowers poisoned opponent's Special Attack and Speed.

Name: Ancient Power
Description: May raise all user's stats at once.

Name: Attract
Description: If opponent is the opposite gender, it's less likely to attack.

Name: Baton Pass
Description: User switches out and gives stat changes to the incoming Pokémon.

Name: Beat Up
Description: Each Pokémon in user's party attacks.

Name: Belly Drum
Description: User loses 50% of its max HP, but Attack raises to maximum.

Name: Conversion 2
Description: User changes type to become resistant to opponent's last move.

Name: Curse
Description: Ghosts lose 50% of max HP and curse the opponent; Non-Ghosts raise Attack, Defense and lower Speed.

Name: Destiny Bond
Description: If the user faints, the opponent also faints.

Name: Detect
Description: Protects the user, but may fail if used consecutively.

Name: Encore
Description: Forces opponent to keep using its last move for 3 turns.

Name: Endure
Description: Always left with at least 1 HP, but may fail if used consecutively.

Name: False Swipe
Description: Always leaves opponent with at least 1 HP.

Name: Flail
Description: The lower the user's HP, the higher the power.

Name: Foresight
Description: Resets opponent's Evasiveness, and allows Normal- and Fighting-type attacks to hit Ghosts.

Name: Giga Drain
Description: User recovers half the HP inflicted on opponent.

Name: Heal Bell
Description: Heals the user's party's status conditions.

Name: Hidden Power
Description: Type and power depends on user's IVs.

Name: Lock-On
Description: User's next attack is guaranteed to hit.

Name: Milk Drink
Description: User recovers half its max HP.

Name: Mind Reader
Description: User's next attack is guaranteed to hit.

Name: Mirror Coat
Description: When hit by a Special Attack, user strikes back with 2x power.

Name: Moonlight
Description: User recovers HP. Amount varies with the weather.

Name: Morning Sun
Description: User recovers HP. Amount varies with the weather.

Name: Nightmare
Description: The sleeping opponent loses 25% of its max HP each turn.

Name: Outrage
Description: User attacks for 2-3 turns but then becomes confused.

Name: Pain Split
Description: The user's and opponent's HP becomes the average of both.

Name: Perish Song
Description: Any Pokémon in play when this attack is used faints in 3 turns.

Name: Protect
Description: Protects the user, but may fail if used consecutively.

Name: Pursuit
Description: Double power if the opponent is switching out.

Name: Rapid Spin
Description: Raises user's Speed and removes entry hazards and trap move effects.

Name: Reversal
Description: The lower the user's HP, the higher the power.

Name: Rollout
Description: Doubles in power each turn for 5 turns.

Name: Safeguard
Description: The user's party is protected from status conditions.

Name: Sketch
Description: Permanently copies the opponent's last move.

Name: Sleep Talk
Description: User performs one of its own moves while sleeping.

Name: Snore
Description: Can only be used if asleep. May cause flinching.

Name: Spikes
Description: Hurts opponents when they switch into battle.

Name: Spite
Description: The opponent's last move loses 2-5 PP.

Name: Swagger
Description: Confuses opponent, but sharply raises its Attack.

Name: Synthesis
Description: User recovers HP. Amount varies with the weather.

Name: Triple Kick
Description: Hits thrice in one turn at increasing power.

Name: Twister
Description: May cause flinching. Hits Pokémon using Fly/Bounce with double power.

Name: Vital Throw
Description: User attacks last, but ignores Accuracy and Evasiveness.

Name: Whirlpool
Description: Traps opponent, damaging them for 4-5 turns.

Name: Aromatherapy
Description: Cures all status problems in your party.

Name: Assist
Description: User performs a move known by its allies at random.

Name: Blaze Kick
Description: High critical hit ratio. May burn opponent.

Name: Bounce
Description: Springs up on first turn, attacks on second. May paralyze opponent.

Name: Brick Break
Description: Breaks through Reflect and Light Screen barriers.

Name: Calm Mind
Description: Raises user's Special Attack and Special Defense.

Name: Camouflage
Description: Changes user's type according to the location.

Name: Charge
Description: Raises user's Special Defense and next Electric move's power increases.

Name: Cosmic Power
Description: Raises user's Defense and Special Defense.

Name: Covet
Description: Opponent's item is stolen by the user.

Name: Dive
Description: Dives underwater on first turn, attacks on second turn.

Name: Endeavor
Description: Reduces opponent's HP to same as user's.

Name: Eruption
Description: Stronger when the user's HP is higher.

Name: Facade
Description: Power doubles if user is burned, poisoned, or paralyzed.

Name: Fake Out
Description: User attacks first, foe flinches. Only usable on first turn.

Name: Flatter
Description: Confuses opponent, but raises its Special Attack.

Name: Focus Punch
Description: If the user is hit before attacking, it flinches instead.

Name: Follow Me
Description: In Double Battle, the user takes all the attacks.

Name: Grudge
Description: If the users faints after using this move, the PP for the opponent's last move is depleted.

Name: Hail
Description: Non-Ice types are damaged for 5 turns.

Name: Helping Hand
Description: In Double Battles, boosts the power of the partner's move.

Name: Ice Ball
Description: Doubles in power each turn for 5 turns.

Name: Imprison
Description: Opponent is unable to use moves that the user also knows.

Name: Ingrain
Description: User restores HP each turn. User cannot escape/switch.

Name: Knock Off
Description: Removes opponent's held item for the rest of the battle.

Name: Magic Coat
Description: Reflects moves that cause status conditions back to the attacker.

Name: Memento
Description: User faints, sharply lowers opponent's Attack and Special Attack.

Name: Mud Sport
Description: Weakens the power of Electric-type moves.

Name: Nature Power
Description: Uses a certain move based on the current terrain.

Name: Odor Sleuth
Description: Resets opponent's Evasiveness, and allows Normal- and Fighting-type attacks to hit Ghosts.

Name: Poison Tail
Description: High critical hit ratio. May poison opponent.

Name: Recycle
Description: User's used hold item is restored.

Name: Revenge
Description: Power increases if user was hit first.

Name: Sand Tomb
Description: Traps opponent, damaging them for 4-5 turns.

Name: Secret Power
Description: Effects of the attack vary with the location.

Name: Silver Wind
Description: May raise all stats of user at once.

Name: Skill Swap
Description: The user swaps Abilities with the opponent.

Name: Sky Uppercut
Description: Hits the opponent, even during Fly.

Name: Slack Off
Description: User recovers half its max HP.

Name: Smelling Salts
Description: Power doubles if opponent is paralyzed, but cures it.

Name: Snatch
Description: Steals the effects of the opponent's next move.

Name: Spit Up
Description: Power depends on how many times the user performed Stockpile.

Name: Stockpile
Description: Stores energy for use with Spit Up and Swallow.

Name: Swallow
Description: The more times the user has performed Stockpile, the more HP is recovered.

Name: Taunt
Description: Opponent can only use moves that attack.

Name: Torment
Description: Opponent cannot use the same move in a row.

Name: Trick
Description: Swaps held items with the opponent.

Name: Uproar
Description: User attacks for 3 turns and prevents sleep.

Name: Volt Tackle
Description: User receives recoil damage. May paralyze opponent.

Name: Water Sport
Description: Weakens the power of Fire-type moves.

Name: Water Spout
Description: The higher the user's HP, the higher the damage caused.

Name: Weather Ball
Description: Move's power and type changes with the weather.

Name: Wish
Description: The user recovers HP in the following turn.

Name: Yawn
Description: Puts opponent to sleep in the next turn.
